Articles.Content: I've noticed there are not alot of people who like trains and spaceships. For those of you living under a tie (rail fans know what I mean) trains have made plenty of contributions to spaceflight. The Russians transport Soyaz on their filthy but pretty cool trains. NASA has their own railway dedicated to transporting fuel to the space center. And trains have made SO much impacts in history. Train Fans come here. Post KSP trains, stuff about trains, and railways in general.
It doesn't take a genius to tell my position on the whole "trains" thing.

Trains shmains.

/jk

I build a model railroad layout for a living. O.o
I'll admit, there are some pretty impressive machines out there. Saw this one in person a few months ago.
Made this SD70ACe almost-replica a few years ago, and it surprisingly still works in 1.0.
Trains. Ah yes... I've slept on many of them.

I..... download link please?

Hello, fellow railfans!

I have been a railfan my entire life, I own trainz 2010, am a Trains magazine subscriber, and saw the Big Boy before it's move to Utah.

Gotta admit, a trip to the country does not feel complete without a finding an old siding, or some other bit of railway to explore.

But the way my favourite stations always seem to get sensitive upgrades has left a bad taste in my mouth.

I used to make stuff in Kuju rail simulator, but it doesn't seem to want to work on windows 8.

Only been in one real train, and it was more for amusement (it was when I was three).

That is what happens when the neighbours' house is not an arm length away from your window.
I'm listening to "I like Trains" right now.
I got to go in the cab of UP SD9043MAC 8027 (Now NS SD9043MAC #7256, and soon to be SD70ACU #7256) once when I was 4.
